```{r}
#| label: setup
#| echo: false
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
library(tinytable)
```

A somewhat up-to-date listing of all the stuff I use to get things done. Inspired by [Usethis](https://usesthis.com) and [App Defaults](https://defaults.rknight.me).

### Hardware
```{r}
#| label: hardware-tbl
#| echo: false

tribble(
  ~item, ~notes,
  "[AirPods Pro](https://www.apple.com/airpods-pro/)", "3rd Generation, essential",
  "[iPhone](https://www.apple.com/iphone/)", "15 Pro",
  "[Apple Watch](https://www.apple.com/watch/)", "Ultra 3",
  "[Macbook Pro](https://www.apple.com/macbook-pro/)", "M1 Pro",
  "[Steamdeck OLED](https://www.steamdeck.com/en/oled) or [Switch 2](https://www.nintendo.com/us/gaming-systems/switch-2/)", "Distractions"
) |>
  arrange(tolower(item), item) |>
  tt(width = c(0.35, 0.35)) |>
  setNames(c("Item", "Notes")) |>
  format_tt(j = 1, markdown = TRUE) |>
  style_tt(j = 1, align = "l") |>
  style_tt(j = 2, align = "r") 
```
